availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky farmer. Maryland native. Married Mary Ann Peake Gay in 1835. Father of Isaiah Gay, Angeline Gay, Mariah Gay, and George Gay.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 142. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Jamestown, p. 47. S. Worrel, Northern Kentucky Marriages, 1795-1850, Ancestry, Campbell County, 1835.
